description: [Apostle](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1133) creates new, encrypted versions of files then deletes the originals, with the new filenames consisting of a random GUID and ".lock" for an extension.(Citation: SentinelOne Agrius 2021)

external_references.description: Amitai Ben & Shushan Ehrlich. (2021, May). From Wiper to Ransomware: The Evolution of Agrius. Retrieved May 21, 2024.
